sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_49239af61b2315105ef09936b04bcb20
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.clpWorkAssignment</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Implements extension point x_tygr_check.ExtensionRunner
Checklist Pro extension points for create/edit/close  condition which customers may invoke their scripts for determining when a Checklist should be created, is editable and/or is associated with a record that is considered closed.</description><name>clpWorkAssignment</name><script><![CDATA[var clpWorkAssignment = Class.create();
clpWorkAssignment.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    clpCreate: function( /* GlideRecord object */ rec, /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // return true if a checklist should be created for <rec>, otherwise return false
        return false;
    },

    clpEdit: function( /* GlideRecord object */ rec, /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // return true if the checklist for <rec> should be editable, otherwise return false
    },

    clpClosed: function( /* GlideRecord object */ rec, /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // return true if the <rec> is to be considered "closed", 
        // otherwise return false indicating <rec> is NOT "closed"
    },

    clpShared: function( /* GlideRecord object */ rec, /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // For clpShared, this "config" parameter will be the checklist where "Type='References Shared Checklist'".
        // As an example, suppose we've declared a shared checklist for the SC_TASK table and the shared checklist
        // table references the SC_REQ_ITEM table.  There will be a checklist configuration (with template values) for the
        // SC_REQ_ITEM table, but "rec" will be the SC_TASK record and "config" will be the checklist configuration
        // for the SC_TASK record, and it will refer to the SC_REQ_ITEM checklist via "config.shared_checklist"
        // 
        // This way the extension point builder knows what we refer to as the "source" record (i.e. the SC_TASK)
        // record and it's CLP configuration record and can also get to the actual shared checklist configuration
        // (which will have the template to be used)
        //
        // ---Important----
        // Following the above example, this extension point function should return the sys_id of the 
        // SC_REQ_ITEM record that is to be related to the specified "rec" SC_TASK record.
        //
        // return '' if no shared record can be found.

    },

    clpPortalSummary: function( /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // return an array of sys_ids of the records from the Checklist Pro Configuration table that are to 
        // be considered for displaying in the Checklist Pro Summary widget.  
        // These sys_ids should be returned as an array from this function and they will be shown in the 
        // clp widget and the Checklist Pro Summary widget will select data from the
        // Checklist Item (x_tygr_check_item) table that reference the sys_ids in this array.
        var arr = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord(config.table);
        // Add custom logic here...

        return arr;
    },

    clpShowButton: function( /* GlideRecord object */ rec, /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // return true if a button (for customizable processing) should appear at the end of the checklist,
        // otherwise return false
        var table_type = rec.getTableName();
        return ((table_type == 'x_tygr_check_record' && rec.state == 'In-Progress') ||
            (table_type == 'sc_task' && rec.state < 3));
    },

    clpButtonClicked: function( /* GlideRecord object */ rec, /* x_tygr_check configuration record */ config) {
        // if the Checklist Pro button is exists and is clicked, this customizable callback will be invoked
        // The function should return an CLP response object structured as follows:
        // {
        //    code:    <integer>,
        //    message: <string>
        // }
        // where Checklist Pro will handle code values as follows:
        // 0: do nothing
        // 1: trigger a reload and re-evaluation of the checklist against the record
        // 2: trigger a reload and re-evaluation of the checklist against the record and...
        //    popup and alert with the contents of the message attribute in the response displayed in the alert
        // all other numbers for release v1.4 shall be treated as code value of 0
        var clpResponse = {
            code: 2,
            message: ""
        };

        // Add custom logic here...
        var table_name = rec.getTableName();

        var reassign = gs.getProperty('tygr.cwa.reassign');
        var reassignment_group = gs.getProperty('tygr.cwa.reassignment_group');
        var instructions = gs.getProperty('tygr.cwa.instructions');
		gs.info('CWA1)\nreassign='+reassign+'\nreassignment_group='+reassignment_group+'\ninstructions='+instructions+'\ntable_name='+table_name);

        // Did the user check the "Reassign" checkbox?  Get that value to see...
        reassign = new x_tygr_check.CLP().getValue(rec.sys_id.toString(), reassign);
        if (reassign.status == 'found' && reassign.value == 'yes') {
            reassignment_group = new x_tygr_check.CLP().getValue(rec.sys_id.toString(),
                reassignment_group);
			
			gs.info('CWA3) Reassignment.status='+reassignment_group.status+', value='+reassignment_group.value);

            if (reassignment_group.status == 'found') {
                if (JSUtil.nil(reassignment_group.value) || reassignment_group.value == 'global') {
                    clpResponse.message = "You must select a reassignment group before re-assigning.";
                    return clpResponse;
                }
            } else {
                clpResponse.message = "Contact your System Administration. The checklist does not " +
                    "contain the '" + reassignment_group + "' template.item value.";
                return clpResponse;
            }

            instructions = new x_tygr_check.CLP().getValue(rec.sys_id.toString(),
                instructions);

			gs.info('CWA4) Instructions.status='+instructions.status+', value='+instructions.value);

            if (instructions.status == 'found') {
                if (JSUtil.nil(instructions.value.trim())) {
                    clpResponse.message = "You must provide instructions before re-assigning.";
                    return clpResponse;
                }
            } else {
                clpResponse.message = "Contact your System Administration. The checklist does not " +
                    "contain the '" + instructions + "' template.item value.";
                return clpResponse;
            }

            if (table_name == 'x_tygr_check_record') {
                rec.state = "Closed Complete";
                rec.update();
				clpResponse.message = 'Closing Checklist and creating new work assignment';
            } else if (table_name == 'sc_task') {
                rec.state = 3; // Closed Complete
                rec.update();
				clpResponse.message = 'Closing Task and creating new work assignment';
            } else {
                clpResponse.message =
                    "Unexpected table: " + table_name + '. Contact your system administrator';
            }
        } else {
			gs.info('CWA2) reassign was not selected: '+reassign.status +', value='+reassign.value);
            clpResponse.message =
                "You must select the checkbox item to indicate a re-assignment is needed";
        }

        return clpResponse;
    },


    /*
     * @function   clpHideReadOnly             Name of the extension point that Checklist Pro looks for to initiate the Hide or Read-Only
     *                                         action on the item and any child item of this item.  The following parameters
     *                                         must not be changed.
     * @oaram      item [x_tygr_check_item]    The Checklist Pro item to be Hidden or set to Read-only (if returning TRUE)
     *
     * @return     true | value
     */
    clpHideReadOnly: function( /* x_tygr_check_item */ item) {
        // return true if the item's value passes is to be hidden or read-only (which action is found in the 
        // x_tygr_check_hide_readonly record. 
        //
        // return true if the action is to hide or make read-only, otherwise return false
		var result = !(gs.getUser().isMemberOf(gs.getProperty('tygr.cwa.WorkAssignmentGroup')));
		gs.info('CLP: in clpWorkAssignment().clpHideReadOnly() returning:'+result);
		return result;
    },

    type: 'clpWorkAssignment'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ty.roach</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-07 15:20:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>49239af61b2315105ef09936b04bcb20</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>clpWorkAssignment</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_49239af61b2315105ef09936b04bcb20</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ty.roach</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-19 02:28:44</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_c3ef52f21b6315105ef09936b04bcbb5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>CLP sc_task Close Check</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	// determine if the record is closed.  If it is and there are incomplete required checklist items
	// associated with the record, determine if the checklist configuration calls for a warning or to 
	// enforce the required checklist items by warning and aborting the transaction to insert or update
	var result = new x_tygr_check.Util().closeCheck(current,true);
	if (result.action == 'abort') {
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ty.roach</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-07 16:16:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c3ef52f21b6315105ef09936b04bcbb5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CLP sc_task Close Check</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c3ef52f21b6315105ef09936b04bcbb5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ty.roach</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-07 16:16:19</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c3ef52f21b6315105ef09936b04bcbb5"/></record_update>
